summary:
Adds a brand new dungeon divided in 6 parts with 8 boss encounters. The entrance is near Winterhold (to the west), just check the map marker and
fast travel there. The dungeon is available in 2 levels on difficulty, normal and hard
descriptionHtml:
Dungeons : At World\'s End
by Lord Dagobert
September 2013

Adds a brand new dungeon divided in 6 parts with 8 boss encounters. The entrance is near Winterhold (to the west), just check the map marker and
fast travel there. The dungeon is available in 2 levels on difficulty, normal and hard. To be able to do the hard mode, you must first
accomplish the dungeon once in normal difficulty and loot the key from the last boss.

All the enemies respawn after a few days, allowing you to do the dungeon again!

List of Bosses:

ROAD OF WHISPERS (1 boss)
-Whisper

MOUNTAINS OF FATE (1 boss):
-The Fateweaver

PEAK OF SEASONS (1 boss):
-Master of Seasons

KINGS\' GROVE (1 boss):
-Warden of the Grove

HAVEN OF SORROWS (1 boss):
-Spawn of Malacath

MALACATH\'S BLESSING (3 bosses):
-Masser & Secunda
-Malacath


LIST OF NEW ITEMS:

-Whisper\'s Blade (drops on Whisper)
- Staff of Fate, which throws powerful lightning bolts (drops on the Fateweaver)
- Necklace of Seasons, which increases your resistance to elements (drops on Master of Seasons)
- Royal Fork, a powerful dagger (drops on Warden of the Grove)
- The Ceremonial Battleaxe (drops on Spawn of Malacath)
- Masser & Secunda, the twin blades (drops on Masser & Secunda)
- End of the World, a new mask that is available on light & heavy versions (drops on Malacath)

Note: You can obtain an upgraded version of these items by doing the Hard Mode difficulty.


Enjoy!
author: Lord Dagobert
